voice_line.quote: The coils of life and death now bind us all. The fog of war is no match for the mist of fate.
You have your marching orders! Aaand we’re off!
Time to break the ice!
Magic shall not prevail!

This disharmony must resolve, or be crushed. Diruulth and Radinthul, your conflicts must be ended. The Self arrives at last. The destruction of the Ancients begins. u Their Ancient must shatter and burn. u Self will destroy the Radiant. u Great upheaval shall lay their Ancient to waste.
Let the carnage begin. There can be no battle till Axe is at hand. And Axe is.
I bring nightmares. Nya ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha! A battle? I must be dreaming!
Ee-haw! That's my signal. Life just got interesting!
Unleash the beasts of war.
The search for blood begins. Over the field of battle, the smell of blood rises like a promise. I love the smell of serum in the morning.
No job is too big, no fee is too big. The hunt is on.
There's trouble abrewing. Time to brawl. It's brawlin' time.
Oh, now we're in it. This is what I'm talking about, heh hah hah. Time to mash some faces, I'd say.
The hunt starts now.
These proving grounds shall be littered with the dead. The tournament is mine.
We descend into chaos.
The persecution starts now!
The fire of war is set. The arrow of war is loosed.
Much to do!
It's all fun and games until someone's frozen solid.
Now it begins, I've seen the end.
Come on Jex, we have work to do. Ohhhh I have chills...40% chance I don't need a horn to tell me when to fight

Creatures of darkness, slither to what dank refuge you please. The light will find you. I honor the memories of the first Children of Light. Let's put some smiles on those faces. Or perhaps grimaces. It's very hard to tell. The star above is unknown to me. But it warms me just the same.
My shadow leaps ahead!
This augurs well for many deaths.
The war storm is upon us. The forecast calls for blood.
Face your demons. The fire starts now.
On your guard.  The tournament commences.
I'm notched, I'm taut, I'm ready to fly. I have waited for this moment...
Through conflict, one's nature is revealed. This beginning marks their end.
Time to shake things up and see where they settle. It's shake-time!
On this alone of seven planes the final war is fought. What long ago I shattered must be rendered whole. The battle is joined, like the pieces of a broken world. u We are Foundation.
They will learn balance. War's flames blaze again!
Ready or not, here I come!
Conflict is eternal. No less so am I.
Time catches all.
My time comes. Theirs comes to an end. The portrait of this battle will be painted in blood. This world will never be the same.
So much for my retirement! So much for being retired...

I don't see what all the fuss is about. For me the battle never stops. So we keeping score now? Gotcha. I don't know the rules, but I'll learn along the way. They say whoever wins this fight will get to call all the shots, but me, I don't want anybody calling the shots. There's something hauntingly familiar about all this. Step fast and shoot straight. It's gonna be a hell of a fight.
Show me where I can do the most good.
So begins a new age of knowledge.
This is a game that two can play. Our war starts now.
The time is upon us!  Put me in the vanguard.
A quest? A quest! A-questing I shall go!
Run up the sail while we've got the tide! Rough seas ahead, crew. Strap me to the mizzen when I give the word.
If they want war, then we shall give it to them!
I come to tip the balance!
And so the dead will bury the dead.
Oh Master, behold all these lives for the taking!
The heat is on.One little spark and before you know it, the whole world is burning.It's fire time!
Ooooh, time for strong-arm tactics.
No foe shall stand against my mission! u No foe shall stand against my mission! It has been too long since these bones felt combat. u It has been too long since these bones felt combat.
The Dark Moon comes. Watch over me, Goddess. It'll be a good show.
Ha! The savagery starts now. The trails will run red.
Horn calls to horn and it begins!
My battle...continues! At last... it comes to blows! Gods and men alike... Tremble!
Tremble, vermin, before the stony gaze of the Gorgon. Their deaths will be swift and cold as stone. Gaze upon Medusa's beauty, and despair!
Let's get this over with. I ain't leaving empty handed! Probably gonna dig a grave or two before this is done.
Look how the prey scatters before us. At last it's time! Our time is at hand!
Try to keep up.  Follow me, and see how it's done..  Where I go, an army follows.
Time to test the waters.
Time to sink or swim.
The season arrives!
No escape!
It's feeding time. And the hunt begins.
My purpose is clear, my targets doomed.
What, it ain't started already? I thought it started.
The Omniscience may spare them, but I will not.
The odds are with us. Or are they? A field rife with possibilities. Let's get the future off to a good start, hmm?
Their sanity I'll shatter, their dreams of conquest I'll destroy. I have solid intelligence on what is to come.
And now, what we've all been waiting for. This is about to get interesting. Should I fail, my brothers would never forgive me.
My list has five names on it.
We are coiled, ready to strike.
Ah, gambits and exploits await. I find myself strangely drawn to this odd configuration of activity.
So much meat, so little time. Look at all that meat just waiting to be carved.
Time to earn myself a bad reputation.
Make way for your Queen.
The wraith war begins! Comes now the King of Wraiths! You've never known war unless you've warred with a Wraith! I'LL HELP MY WEAK AND PUNY ALLIES WHERE I CAN.
I enter the fray. Prepare the Underscape for fresh arrivals!
Into the shadows.
Hmmm. What a test this shall be.
Finally. I am king now of all I survey.
I will scatter all who gather here today. Ozh domosh acha.
Souls await!It's the perfect time to start a new collection!
Hear me, I speak for the shades!
A hush falls on the battlefield.
I am sworn to turn the tide where ere I can. Even on this fallen field, I dedicate my powers to the lofty Skywrath.
The deep ones send me forth.
Stay out of my way and maybe you won't get hurt, but I doubt it.

Battle's about to start. Hehe. This should be good. I usually try to outwit my foes, but gunning 'em down's just as good. Time to scratch that itch on my trigger finger. Who's making that gol-darn racket? Don't make me pull out my piece! Listen. Just cuz I turned over a new leaf doesn't mean I don't like killing people who really deserve it. Do this right and everything else is water under the bridge. Dust along the trail. And some other thing that's all said and done.
Time for target practice
Into disorder!
The peace is broken!
Storm clouds are gathering. You had better not start without me! Draw back the curtains, I'm here!
I have waited long enough! There is no greater honor! The time has come.
Measurements made. Bombs built. Powder's dry. Okay, let's blow something up!
Well that's it. The secret is out!
The marauders road is ever long. Terror steals across the land.
The hunt begins. Let's catch this tide and catch them in it. We'll turn this tide to our advantage.
There are trees everywhere!
Conditions could hardly be more ideal!
Hard times coming!The road ahead looks rocky, but that's all right with me.
The time has come, and will soon be gone.
The bell tolls for the lord of trolls.
Who's ready for a fight? The first hit is free! Anyone?
They will bleed, and they will burn. And they will learn fear. I will scorch this land and its people will come to fear a new master! Behold me and despair!
Another corpse... on the battlefield.
We must meet this threat head-on!
The time has come! I fly on the winds of war! In I fly on the winds of vengeance!
To the fight.
I fly the nest.
None may flee death for long.

A single mistep could undo aeons of planning. Even I must be careful. I was always watching. Now I lend a hand. Everything is in place. Only one task remains. Now I lay their plans to waste. Now my plans will lay their plans to waste.
Darkness stalks.
Let's weave a battle plan.
Time for target practice. Ooh, now I get to shoot stuff!
Let them all fall still beneath my shadow!
Time for shots..
Time to play god.  Let's make this a battle worthy of my name.  Ah these mortals and their futile games. Oh wait! I'm one of them! Hah ha ha ha ha!
